requirements: Prerequisite: CHEM 165 (or CHEM 113 or 115); organic chemistry recommended.
description:
Introduction to the major classes of biomedical materials: ceramics, metals, and polymers. Their structure, properties, and fabrication connected to biological applications, from implants to tissue-engineered devices and drug delivery systems.
Prerequisite: CHEM 165 (or CHEM 113 or 115); organic chemistry recommended.
title: Biomaterials
